article_title: Families of hostages hold news conference after meeting Pope at Vatican.
sentence: They  should  come  home  to  tell  their  stories,  to  tell  the  stories  of  the  the  people  who  were  murdered  -  so  they  can  be  our  future.

article_title: Families of hostages hold news conference after meeting Pope at Vatican.
sentence: Most  were  dead,  but  some  of  the  lucky  ones  were  trapped  under  the  dead  bodies  and  told  us  what  happened",  including  that  Hersh's  left  arm  had  been  blown  off  from  the  elbow  down,  Rachel  says.  "
